overview: Most of the metal lighters produced in Wenzhou are exported to Europe. The European Union has to implement safety standards against Chinese lighters. This constitutes discrimination against Chinese lighter companies and harms the interests of ordinary European consumers. Wenzhou entrepreneurs represented by Lin Chaoan have gone through a series of unremitting efforts to fight wit and courage, and finally won the victory in responding to CR regulations and anti-dumping investigations.
title: Brilliance in Europe
